title: (x) 'Clear Shield': Please help i.d. this font... - ITC Fenice, Futura {Rainer}
content:
Can anyone help i.d. the fonts in this logo?

All suggestions are appreciated. :)

Thanks in advance,  
A.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202104626im_/http:/typophile.com/files/clearshield_3872.JPG)
author: a.l.i.c.i.a.

comments.content: ITC Fenice and Futura, both artificially slanted.
